Education_78.description: customer’s level of education is 7 (master's) or 8 (PhD)

Kidhome.description: number of small children in customer’s household

Teenhome.description: number of teenagers in customer’s household

Dt_Customer.description: date of customer’s enrolment with the company

Recency.description: number of days since the last purchase

MntWines.description: amount spent on wine products in the last 2 years

MntFruits.description: amount spent on fruits products in the last 2 years

MntMeatProducts.description: amount spent on meat products in the last 2 years

MntFishProducts.description: amount spent on fish products in the last 2 years

MntSweetProducts.description: amount spent on sweet products in the last 2 years

MntGoldProds.description: amount spent on gold products in the last 2 years

NumDealsPurchases.description: number of purchases made with discount

NumWebPurchases.description: number of purchases made through company’s web site

NumCatalogPurchases.description: number of purchases made using catalogue

NumStorePurchases.description: number of purchases made directly in stores

NumWebVisitsMonth.description: number of visits to company’s web site in the last month

AcceptedCmp3.description: 1 if customer accepted the offer in the 3rd campaign, 0 otherwise

AcceptedCmp4.description: 1 if customer accepted the offer in the 4th campaign, 0 otherwise

AcceptedCmp5.description: 1 if customer accepted the offer in the 5th campaign, 0 otherwise

AcceptedCmp1.description: 1 if customer accepted the offer in the 1st campaign, 0 otherwise

AcceptedCmp2.description: 1 if customer accepted the offer in the 2nd campaign, 0 otherwise

Complain.description: 1 if customer complained in the last 2 years

Response.description: 1 if customer accepted the offer in the last campaign, 0 otherwise
